1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Slot substitution.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Attr.Slot
6  ( AttrTree,
7    GlobalSlot,
8    substSlot,
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture               as O
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                   as B
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.TTree           as S
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token           as S
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Attr.AttrName   as S
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Attr.Message    as Msg
17
18-- | Attribute name and its contents.
19type AttrTree = (S.AttrName, [S.TTree])
20
21-- | Global slot name and its content.
22type GlobalSlot = S.NamedTrees
23
24-- | Substitute slots by global and attribute slots.
25substSlot :: [GlobalSlot] -> [AttrTree] -> B.AbMap [S.TTree]
26substSlot gslot attr = Right . concat B.<.> mapM (substTree gslot attr)
27
28substTree :: [GlobalSlot] -> [AttrTree] -> S.TTree -> B.Ab [S.TTree]
29substTree gslot attr tree = Msg.abSlotTree tree $ loop tree where
30    loop (B.TreeB p q sub) = do sub' <- mapM loop sub
31                                Right [B.TreeB p q $ concat sub']
32    loop (B.TreeL (S.TSlot _ n name))
33        | n == 0    = replace n name S.attrNameTrunk attr (`pos` name)
34        | n == 1    = replace n name (S.AttrNormal name) attr Right
35        | n == 2    = replace n name name gslot Right
36        | otherwise = Msg.noSlotName n name
37    loop tk = Right [tk]
38
39    replace n name key assoc f =
40        case lookup key assoc of
41          Just od -> f od
42          Nothing -> Msg.noSlotName n name
43
44    pos :: [S.TTree] -> String -> B.Ab [S.TTree]
45    pos od "all" = Right od
46    pos od n     = case O.stringInt n of
47                     Just i  -> Right . B.li1 =<< od `at` i
48                     Nothing -> Msg.noSlotName 0 n
49
50    at = substIndex $ unwords . map S.tokenContent . B.untree
51
52substIndex :: (a -> String) -> [a] -> Int -> B.Ab a
53substIndex toString xxs n = loop xxs n where
54    loop (x : _)  1 = Right x
55    loop (_ : xs) i = loop xs $ i - 1
56    loop _ _        = Msg.noSlotIndex (number $ map toString xxs) n
57    number xs = map pair $ zip [1 :: Int ..] xs
58    pair (i, x) = "@'" ++ show i ++ " = " ++ x
59
